The Rigid Body Combiner

When you are developing a complex game, you will most likely run into the problem that you will have too many meshes <too-many-meshes> in your scene. Panda3D's flattening methods can help you reducing the number of nodes, but often when you have hundreds of moving bodies this is not always an option. Therefore, Panda3D has a feature to help you reduce the number of nodes, even if they are moving: the .RigidBodyCombiner.
